00017 function checkBarcode($barcode) {
00018   switch ($_GET['type']) {
00019     case 'upc':
00023       $result = XMLRPC_request('dev.upcdatabase.com', '/rpc', 'lookupUPC', array(XMLRPC_prepare($barcode)));
00024       if ($result[1] != 'Error: Invalid length') {
00025         if (strlen($barcode) == 12) {
00026           return 'upca';
00027         }
00028         else if (strlen($barcode) == 13) {
00029           return 'ean13';
00030         }
00031         else {
00032           return FALSE;
00033         }
00034       }
00035       else {
00036         return FALSE;
00037       }
00038       break;
00039     case 'isbn':
00040       if (strlen($barcode) == 10) {
00041         return 'isbn';
00042       }
00043       else if (strlen($barcode) == 13) {
00044         return 'bookland';
00045       }
00046       else {
00047         return FALSE;
00048       }
00049       break;
00050   }
00051 }

00059 function getBarcodeInfo($barcode) {
00060   switch ($_GET['type']) {
00061     case 'upc':
00065       $output = '';
00066       $output .= '<div id="upc">';
00067       $output .= '<img src="upcimg.php?upc=' . $barcode . '" />';
00068       $output .= '</div>';
00069 
00073       $result = XMLRPC_request('dev.upcdatabase.com', '/rpc', 'lookupUPC', array(XMLRPC_prepare($barcode)));
00074 //       if ($debug) var_dump($result);
00075       echo getImages($result[1]['description']);
00076       if ($result[1]['found']) {
00077         extract($result[1], EXTR_PREFIX_ALL, 'barcode');
00078         $output .= <<<_HTML
00079         <div id="info">
00080           <table align="center">
00081             <tr>
00082               <td class="title">Country</td>
00083               <td>$barcode_issuerCountry</td>
00084             </tr>
00085             <tr>
00086               <td class="title">Description</td>
00087               <td>$barcode_description</td>
00088             </tr>
00089             <tr>
00090               <td class="title">Size</td>
00091               <td>$barcode_size</td>
00092             </tr>
00093           </table>
00094           <a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/editform.asp?upc=$barcode">Modify this entry</a>
00095           <a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/deleteform.asp?upc=$barcode">Delete this entry</a>
00096         </div>
00097 _HTML;
00098       }
00099       else {
00100         $output .= 'Product Not Found!<br />';
00101         $output .= '<a href="http://www.upcdatabase.com/addform.asp?upc=' . $barcode . '">Add this item to the database</a>';
00102       }
00103       break;
00104 
00105     case 'isbn':
00109       $xml = parseXML('http://isbndb.com/api/books.xml?access_key=' . ISBNKEY . '&index1=isbn&results=texts&value1=' . $barcode);
00110 //       var_dump($xml);
00111 
00112       // Sometimes, the long title is non-existant, so fall back onto the short title
00113       if (strlen($xml->BookList->BookData->TitleLong) != 0) {
00117         $title = $xml->BookList->BookData->TitleLong;
00118       }
00119       else {
00123         $title = $xml->BookList->BookData->Title;
00124       }
00128       $author = $xml->BookList->BookData->AuthorsText;
00132       $publisher = $xml->BookList->BookData->PublisherText;
00136       $summary = $xml->BookList->BookData->Summary;
00140       $isbn = $xml->BookList->BookData['isbn'];
00141 
00145       $output = '';
00146       $output .= '<div id="upc">';
00147       $output .= '<img src="upcimg.php?upc=' . $barcode . '" />';
00148       $output .= '</div>';
00149       $output .= <<<_HTML
00150       <div id="info">
00151         <table align="center">
00152           <tr>
00153             <td class="title">Title</td>
00154             <td>$title</td>
00155           </tr>
00156           <tr>
00157             <td class="title">Author</td>
00158             <td>$author</td>
00159           </tr>

00161             <td class="title">Publisher</td>
00162             <td>$publisher</td>
00163           </tr>

00165             <td colspan="2">$summary</td>
00166           </tr>
00167           <tr>
00168             <td class="title">Buy</td>
00169             <td>
00170               <!-- Amazon.com uses the ISBN-10 code, so send it that -->
00171               <a href="http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/$isbn/">Amazon.com</a><br />
00172               <!-- Everyone else uses the ISBN-13 code, so send them that -->
00173               <a href="http://search.barnesandnoble.com/booksearch/isbninquiry.asp?ean=$barcode">Barnes & Noble</a><br />
00174               <a href="http://www.booksamillion.com/ncom/books?type=isbn&find=$barcode">Books-A-Million</a><br />
